Method.name: loadResources
Method.Implementation:
if '$data(progress) s progress=0 Set stream=##class(%Stream.FileCharacter).%New() Set sc=stream.LinkToFile(source) if $$$ISERR(sc) quit sc
while 'stream.AtEnd { set resource = ##class(fishnet.Resource).%New() set str=stream.ReadLine() set resource.code=$piece( str, ";" ,1 ) set resource.name=$ZCVT($piece( str, ";" ,2 ),"W") if (progress) w !, resource.code_" - "_resource.name do resource.%Save() } q $$$OK
